headline: Enphase Energy's Software Now Offers AI Upgrade: Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: Investors interested in solar stocks should refrain from buying ENPH stock right now, considering its premium valuation. However, those who own it may continue to do so.

headline: Enphase Stock Has Plunged Since Trump’s Win. The Case for Buying Now.
summary: Solar-tech firm Enphase Energy is the second-worst performer in the S&P 500 since the election. The stock could shine again.

headline: The 'Trump Trade' Is Putting Clean Energy Stocks On Sale
